Description: A: Roughly 50 fragments of gold leaf in different sizes, crumbled and folder over, one larger fragment taken for measurements. One fragment shows decoration in form of many small u-shaped lines with a vertical stroke in the inside creating a pattern of feathers. B: One small disc-shaped bead in red faience.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Temple East Sanctuary
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
